events.name: Art + Tech: How Tech is Disrupting the Art World
events.description:
Sign up for free here: http://mis-arttech.peatix.com

Speakers:

Serena Pang and Wen Lei (Founders, Betwixt Festival)
Benjamin Low (Artist)
Jeffrey Tan (Independent Theatre Producer)

This session delves into how technology is intersecting with art by pushing the bounds of production and innovation. We have assembled a line up of creative individuals who will share their ideas on how technology is:

- Shaping the future of the art world
- Transforming the way we perceive and define art
- Providing new opportunities for creation and innovation
- Forming disruptive marketplaces, allowing for greater access and distribution

Stick around after to mingle with fellow artists, designers, creatives and innovators!


This session is co-presented with Betwixt Festival.
events.location: IDA Labs @ National Design Centre (#03-04, 111 Middle Road), , Singapore

events.name: Building a Business People Love: Our Maker Revolution
events.description:
RSVP for free here: http://mis-maker.peatix.com

Speakers:
Colin Chen (Founder & Creative Director, The General Co & The Refinery Singapore)
Veerappan Swaminathan (Co-founder, OneMaker Group - OMG)
Grey Tan (Founder, TinyMOS)

Fuelled by a growing community of entrepreneurial and innovative creators, makers in Singapore has been gathering momentum in the market. We've invited the most influential maker movement advocates and founders in town to get a glimpse into the state of the Maker revolution in Singapore. 

You'll hear from this expert panel about:
- Their vision for the future of this exciting community
- How makers are disrupting industry with their designs, philosophies and technologies
- The challenges and opportunities of being a maker in Singapore
events.location: IDA Labs @ National Design Centre, , Singapore
